name: Autumnus
description:
~Made for the Cozy Autumn Jam 2022~

A retro-inspired game based off 80's arcade games like Joust and Centipede.

You are a knight of the Autumn Fey, and every year as the season turns to bitter cold, you put up a glorious battle against the unstoppable forces of Winter. Though you are doomed to slumber again through yet another nine months, you will not go down quietly! Battle and survive through 8 levels of increasing difficulty until the avalanche of foes takes you!

Controls: 

Movement - WASD

Jump/Fly - Press/Hold Space

Attack - Left click or Left Shift

Block - Your shield automatically blocks oncoming attacks when you aren't swinging your sword
